messages.title: STANDING WITH THERESA MAY
messages.content: As someone from an ordinary working class background, educated at state school, I'm committed to delivering a fairer society

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Committed to delivering a fairer society with better rail services for Brighton commuters.

issues.brexitEurope: Get the best Brexit deal possible to deliver economic security for our future.
issues.economy: Provide strong and stable leadership for our country to deliver economic security for our future.

housing.content: Committed to delivering a fairer society.

leaflet.personalStatement: As someone from an ordinary working class background, educated at state school, I'm committed to delivering a fairer society.

politicalExperience.achievements: Turning to politics after a 20 year career in business I will be an effective local champion and strong voice in Westminster.

quotes.text: Back me on Thursday 8th June to lead Britain.

images.caption: EMMA WARMAN with an image of Brighton Pavilion in the background.
Theresa May, the Prime Minister, speaking.
